project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password with configurable length and includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

task.name: Implement function to generate a random password.
Allow user to configure password length through input.
Ensure the password includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
Write tests for the password generation function, including tests for length and character requirements.
Execute tests on the password generation script to ensure that it functions correctly.
